long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that makes humping an even more visceral and cinematic experience. 

Features: 


1. Full reply forms on the same page at the bottom of threads. http://i.imgur.com/4p7IE.png 

2. Toggle every feature to your liking! http://i.imgur.com/FZRBK.png 

3. Full emoticon list next to the form, no need to open additional window to insert emoticons => http://i.imgur.com/Hjl5j.png 

4. Fixes to CSS, includes bigger buttons in forms with proper hover effects and reworked pagination buttons to make them easy to click ( http://i.imgur.com/nFP61.png ) 
5. Spoiler open confirmations, when opening a spoiler for the first time, a user will be asked if he really wants to open it. (Option togglable) 
6. Remembering and restoring post messages on server-side failures when using full reply form. Now also survives accidental page refreshes and navigating to a different page entirely (thanks to shole for this! Smile )
